Original:
一直以來我都很喜歡甚至是嚮往原住民文化，週日的晚上來到台北市的一間原住民餐酒館，聽著餐廳主人聊起開這間店的初衷和願景，讓我有很深的觸動。

餐廳女主人其實是平地人，但是很喜歡原住民文化，她說，我們想要打造一個「城市豐年祭」，讓原住民在城市裡也有一個家，讓城市人在這裡也有一個情感連結的地方！

餐廳的男主人本業是一位室內設計師，他說，我有一個畫面和願景，就是有一天在台北的原住民來這裡參加豐年祭，大家不分族別穿著原住民族服搭捷運、走在東區街頭，因為祈駑南（cinunan）就是「台北豐年祭」的意思。

甚至是結合所有在台北的原住民餐廳一起，讓台北豐年祭成為一個傳統，每年到了這個月份，讓所有來自台東、花蓮、屏東、高雄等等住在台北的原住民在這裡有回家的感覺。

這晚我們吃著道地的原住民美食，還有現場的吉他演唱，最後台上台下大家像一家人般的一起合唱，這裡有滿滿的人情味在流動著，有那麼一刻，我以為我身在台東的豐年祭裡。

邀請大家有機會也來這裡感受部落的熱情和美好。
EN:
I have always liked or even yearn for the culture of the indigenous people. On Sunday evening, I came to a indigenous dining tavern in Taipei in the evening. Touch.

The hostess of the restaurant is actually a flattener, but she likes the aboriginal culture very much. She said that we want to create a "city -rich annual festival", so that the aboriginal people also have a home in the city. Intersection

The male owner of the restaurant is an indoor designer. He said that I have a picture and vision, that is, one day the Aboriginal people in Taipei came here to participate in the rich year. Walking on the streets of East District, because Cinunan means "Taipei Fengnian Festival".

Even combined with all the Aboriginal restaurants in Taipei, the Taipei Fengnian Festival becomes a tradition. Every year, this month, let all the Aboriginal people from Taitung, Hualien, Pingtung, Kaohsiung, etc. live here. Feeling.

This night we ate authentic aboriginal food, and the guitar singing on the spot. Finally, everyone sang together like a family. Here is full of human feelings. He is in Taitung's Fengnian Festival.

Invite everyone to come here to feel the enthusiasm and beauty of the tribe.

Original: 難得的原住民餐廳，難得一見的原住民香腸，值得來試試。
EN: Rare Aboriginal restaurants, rare aboriginal sausages, are worth trying.

Original:
這家餐廳真的太有特色太有趣了～有滿滿的原住民特色料理

有新鮮從山上剛運下來的蝸牛吃起來就好像螺肉一樣很好吃👍🏻還有原住民的粽子-吉拿夫，也叫做小米粽，這跟我們一般吃的粽子不同，小米吃起來較不會造成脹氣，裡頭的酸漿葉還可以幫助消化，真心建議吃一般粽子會消化不良的人可以試試看～

而馬告、刺蔥這些食材是原住民很喜歡加入料理的傳統辛香料，竟然也可以在台北這家原住民餐廳吃到（馬告其實種植不易、量少、不容易吃得到），可見它們真的是很道地！不得不說，馬告真的是很讚的食材，可增添食物香氣、去腥、提振食慾，最讚的就是拿來煮雞湯（真的一喝會上癮☺️），而刺蔥拿來煎蛋也是好吃到不行～

那說到原住民當然要來一杯的呀～（喂～） ，他們店裡有一個瘋狂轉轉樂，我轉到了一瓶保力達，他們就幫我現場調配了一杯保力達+米酒的調酒，出乎意料還真的很好喝呢！這其實就是原住民的台式調酒，他們常常會以保力達作為主要的基礎加上一些別的酒，就可以調配出屬於原住民風味的調酒，真的跟一般國外的調酒很不同，特別的好喝👍🏻而瘋狂轉轉樂我朋友竟然轉到了「一瓶喝到底」😂😂😂真的讓大家笑到不行好有趣
店裡的排灣族店員很會唱歌，讓整個氣氛又更熱鬧了啦❤️
好開心的一晚～大家如果有興趣就自己去預約囉，他們會提供原住民料理buffet，個人覺得蠻適合跟一群朋友一起去的👍
唯獨因為這次buffet，沒有加溫的器皿，後面食材都冷了，但請同仁幫忙加熱都很願意，服務親切👍
EN:
This restaurant is really distinctive and interesting ~ full of aboriginal dishes

There are fresh snails that have just been transported from the mountain to eat like a snail meat, and the rice dumplings of the Aboriginal people-Gaamev, also known as Xiaomi Demon. This is different from the dumplings we usually eat. Xiaomi eats more. It will not cause flatulence, the acid leaf inside can also help digestion. People who really recommend that eating general rice dumplings can try poorly.

The ingredients of Ma Juan and Steaine onion are traditional spices that Aboriginal people like to join the cooking. They can also eat it in this aboriginal restaurant in Taipei (the horse promise is actually not easy to plant, the amount is small, and it is not easy to eat). It's really very authentic!I have to say that Ma Xuan is really a very good ingredient, which can add food aroma, fishy, ​​and boost appetite. The most awesome is to cook chicken soup (really addiction will be addicted ☺️), and sting the green onion to fried eggs. It's also delicious ~

When it comes to the indigenous people, of course, a cup of cup ~ (Hey ~), there is a madness in their shop, I turned to a bottle of Polyda, and they helped me with a cup of Polyda+rice wine on the spot. Into the bartending, unexpectedly it is really delicious!This is actually the indigenous people's desktop bartending. They often use Polyda as the main basis and some other wines, which can be prepared to bart , Especially delicious and crazy, my friend turned to "a bottle to drink to the end" 😂😂😂 really made everyone laugh, it’s so interesting
The staff of the Paiwan tribe in the store can sing, making the whole atmosphere more lively again ❤️
Happy night ~ If you are interested, you will make an appointment by themselves, they will provide the Aboriginal cuisine Buffet, I personally think it is quite suitable for it to go with a group of friends.
Only because of this buffet, the ingredients that are not heated are cold, but the ingredients are cold in the back, but I ask colleagues to help heal it. I am very willing.

Original:
氣氛很棒很熱鬧，食物也不錯吃，店裡分樓上樓下的消費方式也都很棒，其他店員服務也都很親民，只是一顆星是給店裡面一位金色(或淺色)頭髮的女店員。
不知道為什麼一直擺臭臉，上菜也都一張臭臉，沒有提醒上菜或是說明這道菜是什麼。
問店員問題或有需求請店員幫忙，也是沒有良好的服務態度，台北原住民餐廳去過很多家，沒有要求店員一定要很熱情或很禮貌，只求有基本或專業的態度，但沒有遇過這種服務方式。
我不明白為什麼要對客人如此不友善(當天就只是一般吃飯喝酒消費更無不合理要求)，或許她當天心情不好，但我們是來消費的，這樣的態度直接影響到我跟朋友下次到店裡消費的意願。
我覺得店裡氣氛很棒，食物也很好吃，難得台北有新的原住民餐廳，我會想再去，但想到那位女店員的態度，會讓我覺得我花錢來受氣，希望可以改善這點，將會非常棒!!!
EN:
The atmosphere is great and lively, the food is also good, and the consumption methods upstairs and downstairs in the store are also great. The service of other clerks is also very close to the people, just a star is a golden (or light color) in the store Female clerk with hair.
I do n’t know why I have been stinky, and I have a stinky face in the food. I did n’t remind me what the dishes were.
Ask the clerk's question or need to ask the clerk to help, there is no good service attitude. Taipei Aboriginal Restaurant has been to many households. No clerk must be very enthusiastic or polite. This service method.
I don’t understand why they are so unfriendly to the guests (that day, it is just that it is even more unreasonable for eating, drinking, drinking, and consumption). Maybe she is in a bad mood that day, but we are here to consume. The willingness to consume in the store.
I think the atmosphere in the store is great, and the food is delicious. There are new Aboriginal restaurants in Taipei. I would like to go again, but when I think of the attitude of the female clerk, I will make me feel that I will spend money to be angry. It will be great to improve this !!!
